hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Discover the story behind Azmeraw Bekele Import & Export and our commitment to excellence in global trade operations.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Established in 2011, Azmeraw Bekele Import & Export is a prominent Ethiopian company founded by Mr. Azmeraw Bekele, who brings over 20 years of extensive business experience. Starting with an initial capital of 20 million birr, our main office is strategically located on Churchill Avenue in Addis Ababa.
story.paragraph2: From our roots in export trade, we have diversified into multiple sectors including transportation, bag manufacturing, hospitality, and fuel services. Our primary focus remains on export operations, specializing in oilseeds and pulses, with established markets in China, India, Turkey, and beyond.
story.paragraph3: Today, we operate a successful woven plastic bags manufacturing facility and are developing a hotel in Jiga town. Our commitment to quality, reliability, and fair pricing, coupled with our strong international partnerships, positions us as a leading contributor to Ethiopia's economic development.

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence and sustainable growth
mission.missionDescription: To provide premium quality Ethiopian agricultural products and essential imports to international and local markets, while supporting sustainable farming practices and contributing to Ethiopia's economic growth through fair trade and reliable partnerships.
mission.visionDescription: To become the leading import-export company in Ethiopia, recognized globally for quality, reliability, and ethical business practices. We aspire to bridge international markets while empowering local communities and driving sustainable economic development.
mission.missionText: To provide premium quality Ethiopian agricultural products and essential imports to international and local markets, while supporting sustainable farming practices and contributing to Ethiopia's economic growth through fair trade and reliable partnerships.
mission.visionText: To become the leading import-export company in Ethiopia, recognized globally for quality, reliability, and ethical business practices. We aspire to bridge international markets while empowering local communities and driving sustainable economic development.

growth.title: Growing Together
growth.paragraph1: Our growth strategy focuses on sustainable expansion while maintaining our commitment to quality and ethical practices. We invest in our people, infrastructure, and technology to better serve our clients and communities.
growth.paragraph2: Through continuous innovation and adaptation to market needs, we've expanded our operations across multiple sectors while staying true to our core values of integrity, excellence, and partnership.

growth.title: Growth
